entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
